Tom Catchings
SVP and Chief Information Officer at WageWorks
March 15, 2015, Rodger managed Tom directly

I have known Tom for a few years and he is a superb leader.  As CIO at Early Warning Services he was integral in EWS's decision to invest in Payfone and when we found ourselves facing a daunting deadline to bring up our data centers within EWS, I chose Tom to make it happen.  Under his leadership everyone involved took their game to the next level and Payfone successfully launched its products into the Tier 1 financial services space on the day required for our first bank customer to go live. Through exceptional leadership, foresight, and experience Tom just makes things happen and met every commitment he made to Payfone. I could not be happier with my decision to engage him to help Payfone.
